flow.header: Follow our guide to pair your Instagram account with the 2FAS app.

menu.title: Please select the method you use to open Instagram now

steps.content: Go to **www.instagram.com** and log into your account.

From the left side menu, select **More** and in the expanded menu, select **Settings**.

Click **Meta Accounts Center option**, and you will be transferred to the site Meta Accounts Center.

Choose **Password and security**, then from the right side menu, choose **Two-factor authenticator**.

Choose your Instagram account.
Choose **Authnetication app** and click **Next**.

Scan the displayed QR code to pair the service with the 2FAS app.

You can also do that by retyping or copying the key next to the QR code.
Go to **www.instagram.com** and log into your account. Tap the icon account in the down right corner.
Tap the gear icon in the upper left corner. Choose **Account Center**. Choose **Password and security** from **Account settings**.

Tap **Two-factor authentication**. Then, choose your Instagram account.

Choose **Authentication app** and tap **Next**.

Scan the displayed QR code to pair the service with the 2FAS app.

You can also do that by retyping or copying the key next to the QR code.
Open the Instagram app, then tap the icon account in the down right corner.
Tap the settings icon in the top right corner. Choose **Settings and privacy**. Then tap **Account Center**.

Tap **Password and security** from the **Account settings** section. Choose **Two-factor authenticator** and tap your Instagram account.

Choose **Authenticator app** and click **Next**.

You may be asked to enter your password for security reasons. Enter your password and tap **Continue**.

Select **Authentication app** as the way to receive verification codes and tap **Next**.

Copy your secret key (use the **Copy key** option on Instagram) and tap **Add manually** to add Instagram to your 2FAS app. Tap **Next** on Instagram, retype the generated token, and tap **Next** and **Done**.
